text: Naphi na apho nikhoyo (xa) niqalisa ukuthandaza, jongisani ubuso benu kwicala leMasjid eNgcwele, kananjalo nokuba sele niphi na, bhekisani ubuso benu ngakuyo, ukuze nabantu bangenzi ngxoxo nani ngaphandle kwabo bazizingcoli phakathi kwabo, ningankwantyiswa ngabo ke nina koko yoyikani Mna! Ukuze Ndifezekise uBabalo lwaM kuni, khona ukuze nikhokeleleke
